Combine T biomarkers

Source: R/T.R
T.Rd

Combine T biomarkers

Usage

T(
  t_tau,
  ptau217,
  ptau181,
  ptau231,
  ptau181_ab42_ratio,
  ptau217_np217_ratio,
  ptau205,
  mtbr_tau243,
  np_tau,
  tau_pet,
  ttau_ab42_ratio,
  .classification = c("2018", "2024")
)

Arguments

t_tau

bmk for total tau (optional)

ptau217

bmk for p-tau217 (optional)

ptau181

bmk for p-tau181 (optional)

ptau231

bmk for p-tau231 (optional)

ptau181_ab42_ratio

bmk for p-tau181/AB42 ratio (optional)

ptau217_np217_ratio

bmk for p-tau217/non-p-tau217 ratio (optional)

ptau205

bmk for p-tau205 (optional)

mtbr_tau243

bmk for MTBR-tau243 (optional)

np_tau

bmk for non-phospho tau (optional)

tau_pet

bmk for tau PET (optional)

ttau_ab42_ratio

bmk for total tau/AB42 ratio (optional)

.classification

Either "2018" (default) or eventually "2024", etc.

Value

A bmk vector representing combined T-status under selected scheme.

On this page

Developed by Ramiro Magno, Miguel Casanova, Pattern Institute.
